Name: King
About the game: This is a game that combines strategy and tactics. You are a king and you will conquer the world through war. You can command the army and make them destroy the enemy cities. After conquering cities you have the opportunity to get generals or gold coins and to upgrade your generals through war, or to recruit troops with gold coins.
